channel.title: LFF2023 on Reviews Per Minute
channel.description: Recent content in LFF2023 on Reviews Per Minute

item.title: Eileen (2023) - 98 mins
item.description: A Hitchcock-inspired thriller complete with a Hitchcock Blonde named Rebecca. There’s an unusual tone but, like Anne Hathaway’s Rebecca, there’s a strange seductiveness to the whole thing even while you begin to wonder if the shoe is ever going to drop.

item.title: Saltburn (2023) - 131 mins
item.description: Emerald Fennell follows up her debut with another black comedy dealing with a vector of privilege: this time, the British class system.
